DOC.detailed_description: The study randomize , control study aim test whether almond , consume within free-living , self-selected diet , improve body composition liver fat , relative low-fat/high-carbohydrate cereal bar ( LF-HC ) overweight obese Blacks Hispanics . A secondary aim determine whether almond consumption lead overall low CVD risk profile . Participants randomize consume approximately 17.5 % estimate energy requirement almonds daily ( 2-3 oz ) high-carbohydrate cereal bar ( 2 g fat less per 100 kcal ) provide equivalent amount calorie . Prescribed energy requirement determine participant individually use Mifflin St Jeor Equation equation activity factor 1.3 . Participants ask consume half food supplement mid-afternoon snack rest meal choice . At baseline visit , participant give 2-week supply allocate food supplement obtain additional supply bi-weekly visit first 8 week . After week 8 visit , participant give monthly ration food supplement , either almonds LF-HC cereal bar , ask come research center every 4 week obtain next supply . At visit , body weight blood pressure measure participant turn weekly dietary diary , report supplement intake . Participants also receive one random phone call every 4 week provide 24-h recall . This recall use index dietary quality also compliance check dietary supplement . In addition , 3-day food record collect prior start study final week ass dietary change due intervention . A food frequency questionnaire also administer screen endpoint study . This food-frequency questionnaire target nut consumption . At end study , intention continue eat almond low-fat diet assess use question adapt de Bruijn et al .
